td.content: s:patient with C/O moderate painful ulcer on the top of lower lip for 4 weeks that is frequent. pt also reports moderate ulcer on left elbow, moderate ulcer with irregular borders that sometime crusts or bleeds. patient is a 25 year old white m extra. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 177 cm, Weight 104.3 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 15 a:Skin Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 0.5 g topical cream, and ordered Shave biopsy.
